name: Rubithed: This Means Panic
description:
Currently, this is just a demo for Rubithed that covers up from 4 out of 10 levels. Please report bugs if you find them. Giving feedbacks and suggestions are highly appreciated!

You are a Cursed Child trying to save nine dolls in a haunted dungeon. For years, there are rumours about Cell Area 1408, which is a cell area they miscount. Some may find the cell area, some may not.

Set in the Year 919, you must find the doll in the dungeon and escape. But beware, the darkness isn't what as it seems...

Credits to Kevin MacLeod [incompetech.com] and Daniel Simions for a waterphone effect. (Proper credits will be in the full game)
